name: Insultagram
description:
This is a Game for my Third Game Jam Participation for the Weekly Game Jam. As an Engine I used the Unity Engine. All the Pixel Art is drawn by myself with the PixilArt Website, as well as all the Animations. The music is generated via. Ecrett Music and all other Sound Effects are made with Bfrx. Because the theme of the Game Jam is "Followers", I first created a game where you would recruit people on their doorsteps, but abandoned it after realising it wasn't very fun to play . So I stuck with my second idea and created a game where you gain followers by roasting comments

Controls:

Left Click 🖱️  /  Keyboard ⌨️
